description:
Many years ago under the leadership of Madame Boss, the organisation called Team Rocket and an agent called Miyamoto manage to confirm that a Mew was living in an area around the Andes Mountains.
Under the guidance of the new boss Giovanni, Team Rocket sent an expedition team to the area to find any fossils of Mew to use in a cloning experiment being conducted by a Scientist called Dr. Fuji.
The expedition was a success as Team Rocket was to gain a Mew fossil which Dr. Fuji and his team eventually managed to clone a superior Pok√©mon to Mew, called Mewtwo.
name: Chousatai
